comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Rita Lydig was a famous beauty. A book published in 1913 (the year in which the Bain Agency circulated this copy of her portrait) contained photos of her mansion (designed by Stanford White) and the art collection which it housed. Here is some biographical info, along with a crayon portrait of her, by Boldini: www.shepherdgallery.com/view_image.html?image_no=255
